entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 01:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -37.1°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

Dewpoint: -40.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
